mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_QNA_SEQ, ROOM_SEQ, ROOM_QNA_TITLE, ROOM_QNA_CONTENT, USER_ID, NICKNAME, PROF_IMG_EXT, ROOM_QNA_STAT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ROOM_QNA_SEQ, ROOM_SEQ, ROOM_QNA_TITLE, ROOM_QNA_CONTENT, USER_ID, NICKNAME, PROF_IMG_EXT, ROOM_QNA_STAT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM (SELECT A.ROOM_QNA_SEQ, A.ROOM_SEQ, NVL(A.ROOM_QNA_TITLE,'') ROOM_QNA_TITLE, NVL(A.ROOM_QNA_CONTENT,'') ROOM_QNA_CONTENT, A.USER_ID USER_ID, NVL(B.NICKNAME,'') NICKNAME, NVL(B.PROF_IMG_EXT,'') PROF_IMG_EXT, NVL(A.ROOM_QNA_STAT,'Y') ROOM_QNA_STAT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') REG_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') UPDATE_DT FROM ROOM_QNA A, SB_USER B WHERE A.ROOM_SEQ = #{roomSeq} AND A.USER_ID = B. USER_ID AND ROOM_QNA_STAT = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DT DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM_QNA ( ROOM_QNA_SEQ, ROOM_SEQ, ROOM_QNA_TITLE, ROOM_QNA_CONTENT, USER_ID, ROOM_QNA_STAT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROOM_QNA_SEQ.nextval, #{roomSeq}, #{roomQnaTitle}, #{roomQnaContent}, #{userId}, #{roomQnaStat}, SYSDATE, null )
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_QNA_SEQ, ROOM_SEQ, NVL(ROOM_QNA_TITLE,'') ROOM_QNA_TITLE, NVL(ROOM_QNA_CONTENT,'') ROOM_QNA_CONTENT, USER_ID USER_ID, NVL(ROOM_QNA_STAT,'Y') ROOM_QNA_STAT, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') UPDATE_DT FROM ROOM_QNA WHERE ROOM_QNA_SEQ = #{roomQnaSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM_QNA SET ROOM_QNA_TITLE = #{roomQnaTitle}, ROOM_QNA_CONTENT = #{roomQnaContent}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ROOM_QNA_SEQ = #{roomQnaSeq}
